alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 730 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Two Buttes, or 15 miles northwest of The Saunders Elevator, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
